EmailTemplate.name: Outbound WEXSMART 10ct rebate #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Save Year-Round with WEXSMART GPS Telematics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I'm following up on my recent message regarding this month's WEXSMART savings opportunity. In addition to the immediate fuel savings, I thought I'd share some statistics that might help build your business case from a recent industry study*:
* Cut fuel consumption by an estimated $1,000 per vehicle, per year * Decrease vehicle maintenance costs by an average of 13% * Monitor dangerous driving & speeding - reduce accidents by approximately 38%
REMINDER: Save 10 cents per gallon for three months** with WEXSMART
Order before December 15th, 2011, and you may be eligible for a 10 cent fueling rebate for your fleet account.
I would appreciate the opportunity to arrange a 20-minute online demonstrate. See first hand how WEXSMART can help your specific situation.
Sincerely, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Cell - {!User.MobilePhone} {!User.Email}
www.wrightexpress.com CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of Wright Express Corporation. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
* Source: Improving Productivity and Profitability through Service Fleet Management, Aberdeen Group, March 2008; "In-Vehicle Data Recorders for Monitoring and Feedback on Driver Behavior," Tomer Toledo, Orin Musicant, Tsippy Lofan, Transportation Research, Part C 16 (2008) 320-331.
** All units must be purchased by December 15th, 2011. Offer includes a 10¢ rebate per gallon fueled for three months. To qualify for the gallon rebate, you must fulfill an order that is equal to at least 50% of your account's fuel cards that are open to charge at the time of order. A minimum 2 year contract is required. Credits for fuel rebates earned will be applied monthly in arrears, following your WEXSMART contract effective date. Additional terms and fees apply. Ask your account executive for details.
